feed.title: ZaneOps Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • feat: Support for git services on public repos with Dockerfile by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/422

bug fixes

  • fix: Some bug fixes by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/426

misc changes

  • chore: update readme and deploy scripts by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/423

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3
